name: MiMi
description:
MiMi is going to be a 2d puzzle platformer where you run so fast you practically double yourself.

Controls : 

  • Arrow Keys for movement. 
  • Space for jump. 
  • ESC for replay.

PS : It really early to create an itch.io page. But having a page and a devlog  where probably no-one is going to see helps me focus on it more.
